page.title: 03A Wragby Schoolboy's Day
page.content: Inside,we change into our plimsolls and go into the classroom.We sit down and get a book out straight away while the teacher calls the register,then we go into assembly.On Tuesdays the Vicar comes in to talk to us about God. After assembly we probably do maths until playtime at 10.30,then we do writing.One day a week we watch a nature programme on television.We play outside before we eat our dinner at 12.30.Lessons start again at 1.15.In the afternoon we might do topic work or play football,cricket or rounders.School ends at 3.15. Back at home,I play out until teatime.After tea I play out again 'till about 8.30,then I watch television and go to bed about 9.30.
